Pre-Game Insights: Rhett Lowder has a 0.59 ERA over his first three starts.
David Festa has a 5.08 ERA in 11 games (10 starts) this season.
Byron Buxton has recorded two or more total bases in each of his last six day game appearances.
Byron Buxton has recorded at least one RBI in each of his last five appearances at Target Field against NL opponents that held a losing record.
Carlos Santana has recorded a single in each of his last five appearances against opponents that held a losing record.

Spencer Steer has recorded a double in four of the Reds' last five road games against AL Central opponents.
Ty France has scored at least one run in each of the Reds' last seven games against AL opponents.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Seven of the Reds' last eight day games after playing the previous day have gone UNDER the total runs line.
Each of the Twins' last four games have gone OVER the total runs line.
